en.title: Who is the subject of this case?
en.line1: The subject of a case may be you, or the person who you are submitting this tribunal form on behalf of.

cy.title: Pwy yw testun yr achos hwn?
cy.line1: Gall testun yr achos fod yn chi, neu’r unigolyn rydych yn cyflwyno’r ffurflen tribiwnlys hon ar ei ran.

subjectFullName.containsMarkdownLink: The data entered is not valid for a full name. Link markup characters are not allowed in this field

subjectDateOfBirth.invalid: Date of birth must be a real date
subjectDateOfBirth.invalidAndIncomplete: Date of birth must be a real date and must include a day, month and year
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteDay: Date of birth must include a day
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteMonth: Date of birth must include a month
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteYear: Date of birth must include a year
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteDayAndMonth: Date of birth must include a day and month
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteDayAndYear: Date of birth must include a day and year
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteMonthAndYear: Date of birth must include a month and year
subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteDayAndMonthAndYear: Date of birth must include a day, month and year
subjectDateOfBirth.invalidDateInFuture: Date of birth must be in the past
subjectDateOfBirth.invalidDateInPast: Date of birth must be after 31/12/1899

subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteYear: Date of birth must include a year (WELSH)

subjectDateOfBirth.incompleteDayAndYear: Date of birth must include a day and year (WELSH)
